list-item.p: COVID-19 is an emerging viral pandemic with no specific clinical treatment available.
COVID-19 induces respiratory, neurological, cardiovascular, renal, and hepatic complications.
USFDA authorizes Remdesivir for emergency use in hospitalized COVID-19 patients.
Convalescent plasma is another clinically used, practical approach to combat COVID-19.
The immunomodulatory effect of convalescent plasma helps in reducing the SARS-CoV-2 viral load.
